ygData.subject: RE: WAaahooo!!
ygData.msgSnippet: As will I.  Hopefully all bards will feedback this thing to death.  I still can t get over the arrogance inherent in taking time to fix something nearly all
ygData.messageBody:
As will I. Hopefully all bards will feedback this thing to death. I still
can't get over the arrogance inherent in taking time to 'fix' something
nearly all bards liked, when they can't be bothered to fix the playing part
of the percussion animation that we have been complaining about since day 1.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 9:55 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] WAaahooo!!


From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>

Since I _really_ HATE the new animation, I logged in in and looked. We
still waddle (with drum while playing Selo's). And I will keep /feedbacking
this one.

Sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: Joshua R. Moore <josh@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 9:49 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] WAaahooo!!


> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> supposedly, let me test it to make sure.
>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> Umm, no, they fixed it so now we just sing.
>
> There was a patch last night.
